landingPage.presentation1: Simplify the management of your pet business with PawThera.
landingPage.presentation2: And focus your energy to our four-legged friends.

features.title: The functionalities
features.description: These are the features we have planned, help us improve it to make it your tool !

ia.title: Artificial Intelligence
ia.description: We are also riding the AI wave to make your life easier

points.point1: For your home visits, artificial intelligence will suggest the shortest or most efficient route for your day.
points.point2: AI will also suggest suitable slots to customers based on their geographical location.
points.point3: We would also like to offer you a Speach-To-Text feature on our future mobile application, which will enable you to concentrate on the session with the animal.
points.point4: Thanks to image recognition, you can scan and save receipts for your business.
points.point5: Once recorded, these receipts will be automatically categorized using artificial intelligence.

accounting.title: Administration and Accounting
accounting.description: The management of your business has never been so simple!

points.point1: An interactive dashboard that you can reshape to your image
points.point2: Centralized management of expenses and revenues
points.point3: Detailed payment tracking for more clarity
points.point4: Customizable billing and quotes that can be sent directly to your client automatically after their appointment
points.point5: Create and edit rich and detailed client/patient records at will

points.point1: Your clients will be able to see in real time the available slots
points.point2: You will have the freedom to plan withdrawal periods to guarantee you income in case of last minute cancellation by your client
points.point3: If a requested consultation is at home, travel expenses will be entered directly into the billing

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.description: Control your calendar with a wand !

points.point1: You can manage your schedule as you wish
points.point2: Automatic synchronization with your favorite calendar (Apple Calendar, Google Calendar, ...)

notifications.title: Notifications & Reminders
notifications.description: Notify your users so they don't miss their appointments anymore

points.point1: You can send emails, notifications or sms to your clients so they don't miss their appointments
points.point2: Automatic management of reminders and notifications with a scheduling system

ctaSection.title: Do you like our application ?
ctaSection.description: Join us and get on the waiting list

waitlist.title: Thank you for joining our waiting list !
waitlist.description: We will keep you informed of the progress of our application ðŸ˜‰

footer.slogan: The application that saves time for independent professionals in the animal sector

metadata.description: PawThera, the application that saves time for self-employed professionals in the animal sector
